titleStmt.title: The figure of seaven Containing divers matters, serious, jocose, pleasant and profitable; fitted to the capacities both of the learned and ignorant. Wherein, is more treated of, then of any subject written before of this kind. By Poor Robin, knight of the Burnt-Island, a well-wisher to the mathematicks. Printed with allowance.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Conyers at the Black Raven a little above St. Andrews Church Holborn,

notesStmt.note: Poor Robin = Martin Parker. Attribution from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University, Cambridge, England.

place.placeName: the Black Raven a little above St. Andrews Church Holborn
